title: Create PQ usage example
description: Create a complete usage example showing how to bootstrap a new Power Query project using this template. Include both minimal and comprehensive approaches, show Phase 0 workflow in action, and demonstrate task breakdown for PQ-specific work.
notes:
Created comprehensive USAGE-EXAMPLE.md in templates/power-query/. Includes:
1. Example 1: Minimal approach (simple data transformation) - 15-minute setup for version control of existing Excel queries
2. Example 2: Comprehensive approach (EU Battery Regulation) - Full Phase 0 workflow demonstrating ambiguity resolution, artifact generation, and task breakdown
3. Phase 0 workflow walkthrough - Detailed explanation of all 4 commands (initialize-project, resolve-ambiguities, generate-artifacts, extract-queries)
4. Task breakdown examples - 3 examples showing when/why to break down tasks based on 5-dimension difficulty scoring
5. Key takeaways - Decision criteria, ROI calculation (81% time savings), decision tree for breakdowns
Total length: 750+ lines with complete code examples, JSON schemas, and real-world scenarios.
